text:
Checked out the newly opened @kdolsot.bbq and it‚Äôs quite an experience!

Opening specials!
Their Korean Teppan Chicken Set for just $1 (16-18 Mar) is an insane deal! And if you miss that, there‚Äôs 1-for-1 from 19-25 Mar ‚Äî super worth it too as U.P. is $5.50/set! The set also includes rice, soup & 3 kinds of banchan!

We also tried their Korean DIY Dolsot BBQ Set (from $19.80 for 2 pax), which comes with 2 kinds of meat, lamian noodles, 4 types of banchan & lettuce ‚Äî so value for money! Plus, their variety of sauces and condiments make the DIY grilling experience extra fun and tasty.

Affordable, delicious, and perfect for a casual Korean BBQ fix. üëèüèº

üìç KDolsot BBQ
530 Ang Mo Kio Ave 10, #01-2379
Singapore 560530 (inside S11 Food House)

affordable and delicious DIY Korean BBQ experience, this new Dolsot BBQ spot in AMK is a must-try! We ordered the 2-3 pax DIY Dolsot BBQ set ($19.80), and it was a great value for the price.

The set came with juicy chicken and pork, springy lamian, fresh lettuce wraps, and four types of flavorful banchan. Everything was fresh and paired perfectly with their tasty sauces. The DIY grilling made the experience even more fun, and it‚Äôs perfect for sharing with friends or family.

Service was friendly, and the atmosphere was cozy. Definitely a great place for a casual BBQ meal without breaking the bank. Will be back to try more!
Very flavorful and value for money kbbq that just opened. Preferred their pork vs beef. Free flow sauces. Aunty was very friendly and patiently explained how to eat the entire meal.

Amazing experience at K-Dolsot Korean Stone Pot BBQ! The food was absolutely delicious‚Äîwell-marinated meats, and sizzling hot stone pots that brought out all the flavors perfectly. The portions were generous.

The service was top-notch; the staff was friendly, attentive, and quick to assist with grilling. The ambiance was cozy and authentic, making it a great place for a meal with family or friends.

Highly recommend trying their Korean BBQ sets and stone pot dishes‚Äîtruly worth it! Will definitely be back for more!

A New Culinary Concept, Korean DIY Dolsot BBQ Set ($19.80 for 2 pax, $33.80 for 4 pax), provides a good experience to cook sizzling meats and yummy noodles, with special sauce and condiments provided, according to your own preferences.

The set comes with 2 or 4 kinds of meats (with sliced onions), lamian noodles (with special sauce for flavouring the fried noodles), 4 different banchan, and lettuce (to wrap the meat and banchan in).

Korean Teppan Set Meal (comes with 3 banchan, a soup and a rice) is affordable ($5.50 to $8.50 for the 4 choices of meat) and yummy.

Available inside S11 FOOD HOUSE at Blk 530 Ang Mo Kio Ave 10.
